history.proof: intros Q y R HstabQy HstabyR. qsimpl use: stable.

ctx: intros Q y R HstabQy HstabyR.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce stable to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros Q y R HstabQy HstabyR.
exceptions.tactic: inversion HstabQy as [P Q' H1 H2 |].

original: intros Q y R HstabQy HstabyR. unfold stable in *. inversion HstabQy as [P Q' H1 H2 |]. inversion HstabyR as [Q' R' H3 H4 |]. apply (stable0 R Q). intros a H. apply (H3 a). apply (H1 a H). intros a H. apply (H2 a). apply (H4 a H).
